short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a QR code for the current URL with download and customization options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description (Short):
Generate QR codes instantly for any webpage you're visiting. Customize size and color, then download or copy to clipboard.

Detailed Description:
QR Code Generator is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension that lets you instantly create QR codes for any webpage you're visiting. Perfect for sharing links across devices or with others quickly.

Features:
• One-click QR code generation for current webpage
• Customize QR code size (Small, Medium, Large)
• Choose custom colors for QR codes
• Download QR codes as PNG images
• Copy QR codes directly to clipboard
• Clean, intuitive interface
• No ads or tracking
• Works offline

How to use:
1. Click the extension icon while on any webpage
2. The QR code is generated automatically
3. Adjust size and color if desired
4. Download or copy the QR code
5. Share with others!

Perfect for:
• Sharing websites between devices
• Quick sharing in presentations
• Saving links for later
• Creating physical handouts with web links
• Digital marketing materials

Privacy Policy:
This extension does not collect any personal data. It only requires access to the current tab's URL to generate QR codes. No information is stored or transmitted to external servers.

Privacy Policy for QR Code Generator Chrome Extension
Last updated: November 15, 2024

Information Collection and Use
The QR Code Generator extension is designed with privacy in mind. We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information.

Required Permissions

tabs: Used only to access the URL of your current tab to generate the QR code. We do not access any other tab information.

Data Storage
All QR code generation happens locally in your browser. We do not store any data on external servers.

Third-Party Services
This extension does not use any third-party services or analytics.

Updates
This privacy policy may be updated occasionally. We will notify users of any significant changes.

Category: Productivity
